website_summaries.verdict: Budget-priced model with assortment of unique design features that make it a value buy. Easy to use and maintain.
pros: One of the more ergonomic manually operated handles
Has a spray mist for maximum reach (instead of other models that just spurt jets of water)
Comes with its own cleaning tools for microfiber cloths
Many reports of excellent customer service with 24-hour replies and responsiveness
cons: Some issues with handle mechanism after a few uses
Bottle isn't always well secured and sometimes pops out on its own

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something worth my money that was easy to use and would make the least amount of a carbon footprint on the earth. What’s great about this mop is that you can make your own solution which I’m thankful for as I have a very active and mobile 8 month old. I wanted something I could use my own, baby safe, cleaning solution. What’s a plus is that there’s a spray bottle attached! That’s what sold me on this one. Plus the mop comes with two pads that are washable! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Suzuki

customer_reviews.title: fabulous spray mop!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous spray mop! I am beyond happy with it! I had sat and researched spray mops to get the best I could for a decent price and yup this was it! I am very happy with the mop it does exactly what I wanted it to do...I am disabled and have mobility issues so finding a mop I could use to clean with instead of the "mop and bucket" I got this to help me and it did big time! You cant go wrong with it, it does what you want it to and more. So id highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lee Shamion

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop system. I use white vinegar/water as a cleaning solution in my home so putting that solution in the water tank was a no brainer. My floors are clean without nasty chemicals. Besides a cat I have 2 birds who can be harmed by chemical fumes. Comes with two easily removable cleaning pads so there's always a clean one to use.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for almost a week and I have to say I’m very satisfied. First of all, when I received it, it appeared to be smaller than what I had expected. However, I have soon realized that it was designed that way so users could hold right at the spray handle when mop. That is a very great idea as I never have to use a bucket anymore. Mopping floor has never been so easy, as I can just pick up the mop with pre-filled cleaning solution and mop as I spray.
customer_reviews.author: Tramduc0_0

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a necessity if you are in college and have multiple roommates! We all have that one roommate refuses to clean which can be pretty annoying. This product makes cleaning easier because there is no need of a mop and better than a swifter jet! The box comes with two reusable mops so no need to buy wipes! This is definitely worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: No streaks
customer_reviews.text: The product did not leave streaks on the floor like other laminate flooring products
customer_reviews.author: Juanita C. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love how you can use whatever cleaning solution you prefer in addition to being able to wash the pads. Definitely well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for quick cleanups next to my backdoor when my dogs come in, and it works perfectly for that! Easy to clean and refill, and the pad stays on nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper88

customer_reviews.title: This is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Very happy with this purchase. No longer will I buy those other raggedy mops. Love the spray bottle feature which makes mopping so convenience and quick, as well as the washable microfiber pads. I have literally mopped the floors everyday since receiving this 4 days ago. Can't believe I wasted so much time and money with those other mops! I will continue to buy these type of mops for the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: KimKim2013

customer_reviews.title: Great mop for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was using a Bona mop on my laminate floors. This mop does just as good a job and much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Shull

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: Its nice... serves purpose well. Lightweight and easy to asssemble
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, easy to use, and easy to wash floor pads. We mix a bit of Dettol with water in the removeable bottle and simply pull the lever to spray where needed and wipe it up with removable.
customer_reviews.author: Colive

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw the size of the bottle, I thought there was no way it was going to last with me mopping 1000 square feet of tile, but surprisingly, it did and I even had some leftover! I love that it comes with two cloths, so I can wash one and use the other.
customer_reviews.author: Guineapigmom

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, extra mop pads are cheap. Seems a little flimsy but it hasn't broken yet.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Great value for the price. The tank is small so it needs refilling often.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G.

customer_reviews.title: Use my own cleaning products!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my ceramic floors spray without batteries and refill bottle with preferred cleaning products!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Von LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop easy to glide dont have to keep using a pad that will constantly dry dont mund pushing the button .
customer_reviews.author: agnesmommy

customer_reviews.title: No problems so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It’s been a couple of months and it’s doing what it’s supposed to. Cleans well. Easy to use assemble and wash.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Handle pump stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Pump for the liquid stopped working! Flimsy made product where i feel like I could break this is I used even a little bit of more pressure downward.
customer_reviews.author: Elbert

customer_reviews.title: Canister broke one month after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Loved the mop and large mop pad for quick cleaning our large main floor. Unfortunately, the solution holder started leaking out the base a month or so after purchase, just after the return window closed. The entire canister empties in one mopping leaving the floor sopping wet. My last spray mop lasted 10 years, this one, 1 whole month.
customer_reviews.author: happy day

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I dont know where these other reviewers are from but this mop is the poorest quality ever. Dollar store mop would be better .... do not waste your money on this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week..
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this mop, I really did, the positive review seems good, but it disappointed me a lot! At first ,the bottle keeps popping out, and every time I need bend to adjust it, it makes me even more tired, I bought it for convinient, but it obviously not! Totally junk! Then the spray function broke within a week, probably got to use it around 3 times, the bottle started leaking everywhere, terrible! You got what you pay for, save your money for a better one!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Green

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made terrible design
customer_reviews.text: This mop is very light, very cheap feel when i got it, it does not work so well as the ads said, I don't know what about other's, but i found it almost impossible to remove when refill the cleaning fluid reservoir, every time I try very hard to manage to do it, is that the spray is in a wide fan so you have to watch out about getting cleaning fluid all over places you might not want it, very annoying, just throw in trash.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Gassett

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This product is VERY cheap. I only used it twice and then replaced it with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Unpredictable spray pattern
customer_reviews.text: This was a great mop for the first 4-5 uses. While being advertised as the "perfect spray", this mop sprays in unpredictable directions. You may spray the floor, the wall, the cabinets...there is no way to predict. I really wanted to like this mop. And, of course, all this happened beyond the 30 day return window for Amazon. Please resolve this, manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL! Flimsy. Hard to put together. The pads fall off. The sprayer broke with in 2 uses. Don’t buy. Go with libman or ocedar.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle924

customer_reviews.title: Piece of CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: I intended to use the mop for my house cleaning business. It's small, flimsy, and a piece of crap. Missed the return window by a few days so I am stuck with it. I'll just donate. Maybe someone in a small apt will be able to use. Good spray mops are hard to find. Don't buy this one for serious cleaning. Didn't even want to give a 1 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: JK Freedom Works!

customer_reviews.title: Genius idea, doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Every third time I spray with the handle, it gets stuck and takes a minute to fix itself. This makes cleaning the floor extremely frustrating and takes much longer than it should. I also purchased this to replace the one I had that broke at the bottom where the pad is. Turns out it’s the exact one that I had before. So it’s total junk, look elsewhere people!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Easy simple mop.
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of this mop.if you need to scrub something on the floor you have to apply alot of pressure down on the mop to get it. I've only used it about 5 times. Its quick and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Savonne Castro-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this item before and within 2 weeks stopped working so returned and ordered new. This time it lasted about 4 months and then same issue again but this time I am outside of Amazon return period so had to throw away. Not a reliable device at all. Try other similar products but stay away from this.
customer_reviews.author: Bina Munzani

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is pretty sturdy. I've used a good amount of pressure to scrub spots off of the floor and it's worked as expected and shows no signs of wanting to break. The little brush it comes with is nice too and can come apart and be cleaned. Tank is a great size, sprayer works well. I've had issues in the past with other mops and brooms and the handle not being long enough but this one is great. It also cleans better than my previous spray mop.
customer_reviews.author: TnJ

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in a month.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mop when we first got it. Easy to assemble, fill, and use. However, the canister that holds the cleaning solution started malfunctioning. Whenever I squeeze the trigger, the canister pops up. After 3-4 squeezes, the canister is so far out of the mop that liquid no longer comes out and the whole thing regularly just falls out. Apparently the return window is very short, so it's too late for me to get my money back. I'll probably end up duct taping the canister in place. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Trent

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea of it...
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of being able to use whatever floor cleaner I prefer and can refill as needed and washable pads- which is why I gave it 2 stars. But it hasn't lasted more than a few months before it randomly started just pouring the fluids out on it's own. I have soaked my floors multiple times trying to figure out if I just didn't inset the bottle properly or shut it all the way but it seems that it just leaks all the time now. So much so that I can't even use it anymore. Very disappointing but hopefully an improved version will come out!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Englander

customer_reviews.title: The best mop ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for myself. I needed something light to clean my floors, and this is perfect! Love that it has a small brush on the side. I heave a cockatiel in our den and sometimes I need to clean the cage around it although I have a towel on the floor, and that is the perfect tool to clean it with, and then mop the floor! I want to buy another one for the other end of the house, the kitchen! I simple love it, and the price is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian R. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Easy to use and best part is it uses no batteries! Light enough that kids can use. Three year old can easily use the trigger too. Very fun. Mother-in-law asked where I got it and everything. Nice to not have to wait forever for the floor to dry too. Good solution to quick spot moping too. No more mop buckets etc.
customer_reviews.author: dineeta

customer_reviews.title: This is a floor polisher. This is NOT a mop and it is NOT for floor cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I very much regret the purchase of this product. This product is advertised as a "mop for floor cleaning" but it does not do that. This product cannot properly be used as a mop. At best, it can be used as a small push-broom if you don't use the liquid. This product cannot clean a dirty floor. This is a floor polisher. It does a great job of polishing an already clean floor.
customer_reviews.author: R. M

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few months then completely fell appart
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this it really was great to use. But after a month or two went by the whole thing leaks and leaves puddles all over our new floors. We will be investing in a better put together one now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: So Handy
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop. It's so handy. I just take it out of the closet and it's ready to use. Fill the bottle with my favorite cleaner, and I can mop my floor everyday for a week without refilling, or getting my hands wet. Love the velcro attached mop cloth, it's so easy to clean and put back on. My favorite mop of all time!
customer_reviews.author: eyesee2011

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The item was clearly returned by another customer and was resent to me. The handle pump did not work, which was obvious before I even tested it! Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: debra ruddy

customer_reviews.title: Mine was broken/ the trigger on handle no spring/does not work.
customer_reviews.text: And the problem the pandemic must stay home except for medicine & food can not return now! Hopefully before deadline May 31, 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Black

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Spray-hole clogged up after 2 uses. It started spraying a red-ish colored liquid, like rust, then stopped spraying completely. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Calizon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: You get your money’s worth, but mine came with a leak when I insert the bottle. Every time I mop, it leaks out excess water and floor cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: This is the one people!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, I went back and forth with 5 of these mops from different sellers. ALL of them leaked. This one is a little smaller, but I really like the design and ease of use. I like that I can just throw the used ones in the wash! It works fantastic. AND...this one...DIDNT LEAK!!!! Love it!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C. Tryon

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to clean up those little messes on my hardwood floor without getting down on my knees. Light weight , I use it as a damp mop with water and I can spray as little or as much water as I need for the job. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Stitcher

customer_reviews.title: "Price and quantity is my motto"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my Mom who has serous back problems enabling her to use a mop. With this product is the greatest tool that you can use without twisting your back. I love this product because you can put any type of cleaner in the reservoir bottle without harming the product. Also I love the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charlette Rasberry

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I expected to be bigger, but eventually it turned out to be perfect for my small flat. It fits a kitchen closet easily, cleans floors well and even my 2 year old son uses it for cleaning. So, it is not heavy at all. I was afraid that it is going to get broken fast as it seemed to be fragile, but no. It is still in a perfect condition and does its job properly. I would say it is a good product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Eco-friendly alternative to the Swiffer
customer_reviews.text: Great substitute for the Bona cleaning system, and a better value. This cleaner is sturdy and durable. Better option than the swiffer wet jet in my opinion because the pads are reusable. Cleaning the microfiber pads is a breeze, just throw them in the washing machine. My only issue with it is that the tank that holds the cleaner gets pushed up out of its compartment upon use so I have to push it back down every few minutes during use.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit short for me and unfortunately mine arrived incomplete but it was easy to assemble it just feels to thin or weak should i say. I just feel like it sadly wouldn’t last me long until id have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Owned less than a month and head snapped off BUT IT CAN SNAP RIGHT BACK ON
customer_reviews.text: Saw some reviews of others saying the head snapped off which happened to me today I was discouraged because I thought I had actually broken it. However with some force you’re able to pop it back into the slots so it’s NOT ACTUALLY BROKEN I love it for my room makes mopping less of a chore
customer_reviews.author: Tiara M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean as well as a swiffer
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to buy this to have a swiffer-like mop but with reusable pads and a refillable container. The pad is washable and the soap container can be refilled. However the reusable microfiber pad just doesn't pick up as much dirt as a swiffer wet jet. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deland Bill

customer_reviews.title: Worked well while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when we had to let our cleaners go in March. Worked well but now the mechanism that holds the liquid leaks. I can't see any obvious cracks but it leaks all over the floor and is unusable. Wish I could figure out how to contact the manufacturer for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Torres

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Floor Clean Up Is A Breeze!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It's lightweight which makes it easier on me & is a quick mop up in our kitchen due to water spills,footprints & dog paws. I even have some pads from former mops I can use as extras. I like being able to use any solution I like which now is water with a small amount of Mr Clean. At $20 bucks it's a good deal & I can replace if I need to in the future.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: A bit frustrating. Came a bit detached from the bottle causing the spray to not come out unless I constantly pressed it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin P

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for small apartment.
customer_reviews.text: Taking this mop out of the box, I had it put together in 30 seconds. I have a small apartment and this is perfect for the spaces i need to mop. I use about 1/2 of the spray bottle when cleaning the hardwood areas of my place. The two microfiber cloths work really well, and the scraper is a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to get excited about
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Too lightweight so you really have to press down hard while mopping. Microfiber develops a lot of strings quickly. not much spray comes out.....Back to OCedar for me.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great mop! I was considering a Swiffer wet jet, noticed it requires batteries. I like that this one is manual and has reusable washable mop pads! The mop feels sturdy. I wish the mop stick was about an inch longer.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mop and it’s very easy to use. Just the right amount of liquid sprays out. I like that I can use any floor cleaner I want in it. Definitely one of my new favorite cleaning products. I gave it 4 stars because the bottle came with a tiny hole in it. But it was easy to patch up with a little duck tape.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Best hardwood spray mop I have found to date.
customer_reviews.text: Best hardwood spray mop I have found to date. Watch the small polyurethane tip inside the spray cup as it tends to become dislodged. Easily placed it back. Solid pole and pivot joint. Good value for the money. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Brooklyn Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I just looked at the box it came in and laughed I never even opened it. It was broken down and put in this tiny box. I just knew then it was garbage. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: MARIE

customer_reviews.title: Quit working the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I'm 0 for 2 with these spray mops. I want to love it, but it needs to work first. The spray lever worked for about five sprays and then quit. I took it apart and put it back together, but it still doesn't work. Still on the search for a decent, or just working, spray mop.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: It s good enough
customer_reviews.text: works great, easy to use, not too sturdy tho. Updated review Customer service is great they followed on my request right away and offered to send me a new one. Still waiting on the new updated product, will review once I get it. They said the new mop is nicer. I LOVED the old mop can't wait to get the new one.
customer_reviews.author: taous

customer_reviews.title: works best  for us in our smaller home
customer_reviews.text: this mop makes cleaning our tile and hardwood floors a breeze. we had to replace the old one we had for quite some time due to its trigger on the squirter function finally breaking. this is a worthwhile household necessity if you don't have a lot of carpets and area rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Torrey

customer_reviews.title: Light & easy, but I don’t anticipate it to last
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to assemble. I took out 2 stars because it feels cheap and mop pad is really small. The container bottle is quite small as well, but I guess I’ll just refill more frequently. It doesn’t seem that it’ll last but we’ll see
customer_reviews.author: SL。214

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the Branded ones. Good for the environment.
customer_reviews.text: This cleans as easily and as much as the other branded ones you can find at department stores. The best part is that you can reuse the mops without having to constantly keep buying use and throw ones.
customer_reviews.author: Uday M.

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: love this! traded in my swifter for this. Way cheaper since the clothes are washable and they don't loose their durability. Plus I get to pick the cleaner
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Easily fits together and goodsprayer!
customer_reviews.text: This thing came in a box I was surprised it fit in, it was so small but then it came out and fit together no hassle. It works well and I love that it comes with two rewashable pads so I can trade them out after each use. The spray is good, it spreads out well, better than I think a Swiffer, I also like that it doesn't require batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice. Nothing fancy, but gets the job done. Less expensive than more known brands, but works just the same. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: OKAY
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I had it in my mind that this was going to be more industrial type. But it really is on the very dainty side. You would be just as good buying one from Target or Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: CDolman

customer_reviews.title: BEST DEAL
customer_reviews.text: You can use your own cleaning solution and have a reusable mop surface. Saving not only you money but also the environment. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Zenas Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Prime day purchase. Package was damaged upon arrival. Cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.author: F Wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked great tell it started to fall apart it’s just a little to cheep some kind of black crap started to come out of it I have no idea what that was a filter or something just started to crumble into the water
customer_reviews.author: Emily the great

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of essential oils so a mop that gives me the option to add my own solution is a plus. I really like it and hope to enjoy it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Do Do

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works great. Loved that I can reuse the pads by just throwing them in the washer! I also added some fabuloso to the jug and worked just as great
customer_reviews.author: Lydia stutler

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I used this spray mop maybe twice, emptying the spray bottle as instructed when I finished. The next time I used it the bottle was leaking all over my floor when I tried to use it. I've tried two other times. No luck. 😞
customer_reviews.author: John W parsons

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and easier way to clean your floors.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop!! I wanted a easy use mop, and this is it. I love that I can put my own cleaning mixture in the applicator, and throw the pad in the washer. Very economical.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great prize
customer_reviews.text: Love it i clean every project with trying new stuff to keep my 4 month old son dont craw on no dirty flores thank u
customer_reviews.author: RJ Allen

customer_reviews.title: Hardwood Spray Mop
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the mop very long and am only giving it a four star because I don't know how I will feel about this mop in the future. So far I love it. Light weight, good spray, easy to use, comes with two mop pads..
customer_reviews.author: Verna Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Underside of handle is hard plastic with rough edges that hurt your hand. The liquid leaked from the bottle so that it was dripping on the floor. The length is definitely shorter than a Bona mop so you end up hunched over. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: turningroad

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Easy Very light 123 assemble Quick What more could you ask for in a mop
customer_reviews.author: Aqua Moon

customer_reviews.title: Did not last for too long
customer_reviews.text: I had it for three months now, using 3-4 times a month. The spraying system including the stick got broken. The mop now basically gets disassembled every time I use it. Just offered a different brand, hopefully more steady.
customer_reviews.author: smartshopper

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning quality
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it but the water tank is a little small. No big deal. I can add more to the tank if needed. Mop head is great. Extra large and really cleans. Spray goes just where I want it to go. Doesn't spray really high like some mop jets do.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice light cleaning mop.
customer_reviews.text: REAL REVIEW BY REAL CUSTOMER So far so good! Mood and sprays like it’s supposed to. 4 stars because it’s made for light cleaning, not getting grit out. I use it around the house as a touch up until it’s time to do a full mop.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Easy and light
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I used it to do a client's ceiling the other day. Not too heavy and easy to assemble and disassemble. No batteries required. Extra pads are a must as velcro wears out quick
customer_reviews.author: Susan Marie Beucler

customer_reviews.title: Started right away
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after the second time using it. It leaks now. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: Great mop for the price! Very sturdy and doesn't making crackling noises when I use it. Would totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Grayce T.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent and works well.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to use and pretty light. Great for quick cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Oreo

customer_reviews.title: For the price it works good
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t long enough but other than that it’s a great little spray mop for the price
customer_reviews.author: Cherokee

customer_reviews.title: Came quick
customer_reviews.text: So far prouduct is great it's smaller than expected. Feels okay you get what you paid for. Will update in 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest way to clean, I love the mop, tried slot of others, but this one really tops the list, get one!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Loved for awhile...
customer_reviews.text: I used this mop about once or twice a month for just over a year when it suddenly stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: adrichmond

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: It's light, but it does the job. Hold enough cleaning solution for one room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should have spent the extra $10 on the real Bona!
customer_reviews.text: I like that the mop is lightweight, but I should have spent the extra $10 and got the Bona! First week of using, and the sprayer doesn't spray right! It's so cheaply made, I'm afraid it's going to break if I have to actually scrub a spot on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Hill

customer_reviews.title: I loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I just love it! It is so easy to clean my floor! I have a one year old baby and he is so messy when he eats XD, and I always spent so many time cleaning after him. This mop save my back and my time.
customer_reviews.author: Jose D Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this mop for spot cleaning, although you can do the whole floor. I like that you can add your own cleaning solution or plain water (unlike Swiffer Wet Jet where you have to purchase their solutions). Very lightweight and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rosita Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Using it with myers lavender cleaning solution  which is pet friendly
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed ! Iam now a clean freak ! So easy to use and try’s quick since it sprays perfect amount of cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Easy 123
customer_reviews.text: Love this, use natural vinegar solution and water. Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: NICNTATES

customer_reviews.title: Great mop for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble the few pieces in the box. Works very well. Great purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Ed W.

customer_reviews.title: Very Surprised...
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the box it seemed too light for what I ordered and when I seen all the pieces it looked cheap & small. After I put it together I was surprised how tall it was. The refill bottle was small but good enough for what I need. Great for small messes and so easy to use. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The brush cleaning attachment can fray the cleaning pads... just wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Hamouris

customer_reviews.title: If you are tall, like I am (5’8”) the handle is a bit short.
customer_reviews.text: Mop seemed a bit flimsy, but worked well on my tile floors. Plan to try it on my wood floors next.
customer_reviews.author: kj555

product_meta.title: Hardwood Spray Mop for Floor Cleaning, CXhome Microfiber Mop for Tile Floors, Wet Dry Mop With Sprayer And 2 Mop Pads, 1 Refillable Bottle
product_meta.description:
CXhome wet spray mop will provide you the most professional home cleaning solution, make your family live in a clean and fresh environment!

Features & Benefits: 
★The spray covers full width of the mop head, and the spray mist provides just enough moisture to clean your floors without damaging wood floors. 
★The microfiber cleaning pads use the magic of thousands of microfibers to absorb the smallest dirt and dust particles. 
★The innovative one-touch release allows you to remove the spray bottle quickly and easily, save your time. 
★The ergonomic handle gives you a comfort grip to easily squeeze the trigger and control spray action. 

Troubleshooting Tips:
★To fill the 300ml（10.5oz）liquid container, remove with a firm pull, don’t twist or squeeze, fill and return the bottle, make sure it securely clicks into place, otherwise, the sprayer will not work, the tight fit ensures the seal won't come loose from vigorous mopping. 
★All refillable spray mops are new and tested at our factory with distilled water to ensure operation, any remaining distilled water in the mop or sprayer is perfectly safe. 
★After refilling, it may take up to 30 pulls of the lever to prime the lines and start spraying. 
★Save money by washing your microfiber pad for repeat use, the mop pad is machine washable up to 100 times. 

Package Includes:
√Handle * 1. 
√Middle pole * 1.
√Lower pole * 1.
√Mop base * 1.
√Liquid container * 1.
√Cleaning pad * 2.
feature_bullets: ★Superior Quality & 360° Rotation: The metal pole of the dust mop spray is sturdier and more durable than traditional spray mop refill, which will not get loose and broken; the 360° rotating mop head is ideal for eliminating the most stubborn dirt, oil stain, on your wall, windows, living room, ceiling, under furniture and even corners hard to reach, bring you a tidy environment.

★500ML Refillable Water Bottle & Easy to Use: The mop spray floor is easy to use, no bending, no bucket, all you have to do is to press the convenient trigger on the handle and get the cold water mist you need, you can add different liquid into the mop spray bottle according to your requirements, spray uniformly for professional clean and care, but we suggest that don’t put the strong acid liquid to the bottle.

★2 Washable Pads & Extra Scraper: The soft, water absorption and durable microfiber spray mop pads prolong the lifespan of our mop, the two mop cleaning pads can quickly switch to replace your wet or dry mop, besides, the multifunctional scraper is given to squeeze water on the spray mop replacement, dirt and stains on floor or tile, the side of the comb shape can remove the hair, which will make the cleaning job much easier.

★Environmentally friendly & Save Money: Our microfiber spray mop with reusable and washable pads, besides, it’s water saving to clean with the mop water spray instead of traditional mops with bucket, save your water and save your money, what’s more, the mop spray cleaner doesn’t need to drain batteries or charge, which will not cause any pollution to the environment.

★Most Professional After-Sales Service: Whether it is the spraying mop or our service, with any questions, please feel free to contact with us, we will reply to you within 24 hours and make you satisfied.
